10.title: Architectural Standard: No synchronous file I/O
10.body: We have observed event loop lag in production. From now on, ALL file operations must be asynchronous. Specifically, avoid `fs.readFileSync` and `fs.writeFileSync`. Use the internal `AsyncQueue` service for any persistent storage access.

11.title: Security: Sanitize all input strings
11.body: All user-provided strings must be passed through `sanitizeHtml` before being stored.
